page.title: 18RELIGION RAFFORD AREA
page.content: The main religion of the people of our area is Church of Scotland. As there are many RAF families in the area there are many Church of England members as well. Minority religions were Catholic,Jehovah's Witness and Quaker each with 1 member. We found that about 10% of people interviewed were not members of any church. There is only 1 church in Rafford and it is the Church of Scotland.Of the sample of people interviewed only 9 attended church weekly while 12 attended monthly and 19 people attended less than 4 times a year. 6 people go only to, Christmas and Easter services.Only 2 children attend Sunday school in Rafford.1One person goes to services run by The Findhorn Foundation , 3 people attend a church in Forres while one goes to Elgin.
